content: round 2 place a bor marker round 7 k2tog 10 sts decreased round 1 k2 p2 repeat to end of round round 8 repeat round 2 repeat round 1 27 more times 28 rounds in total break yarn leaving a 20 cm 8 inch tail using a tapestry needle thread the yarn tail through round 2 k to end of round the remaining 10 sts and pull tight to gather repeat round 2 3 more times 4 times in up and close the small hole repeat this total process to secure 3 magpie mittens by debbie ford alternatively you can graft the stitches thumb decreases together using kitchener stitch round 1 k1 k2tog x 6 6 sts decreased working the thumb round 2 knit to end of round place the 19 sts on hold back on your needles round 3 k2tog x 6 6 sts decreased round 1 k19 pick up and k2 sts from the break yarn leaving a 20 cm 8 inch tail using cast on edge on the palm knit 1 join in the a tapestry needle thread the yarn tail through round being careful not to twist your stitches the remaining sts and pull tight to gather up and place a bor marker 2 sts increased 21 and close the small hole repeat this process sts to secure round 2 knit to 4 sts from the end of round alternatively you can graft the stitches ssk k2tog 2 sts decreased together using kitchener stitch round 3 knit to 2 sts from end of round k 2tog 1 sts decreased round 4 knit to end round 5 repeat round 4 8 times 4 magpie mittens by debbie ford
